item.title: Improving My Network: Public Proxy and Wireguard VPN
item.description: This is the third part in my series on taking the Devember challenge and improving my homelab and network. You can find the previous post here. Unifi Dream Machine Pro Problems I upgraded my router to a Unifi Dream Machine Pro over the summer, which has treated me well, but running custom scripts and applications on the box has been a challenge because the UDM Pro will wipe out any customizations whenever a firmware upgrade is applied, and some changes get wiped out in a reboot.
